jChatBox.Chat
Class ChatroomManager

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--jChatBox.Chat.ChatroomManager
public class ChatroomManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class (Singleton) manages all chatrooms.

See Also:
